link_desc:
UniFi Proxy and UniFi Miner

It is a tools written in Perl, which helps deliver to the monitoring system (Zabbix) operational data - metrics and settings obtained from the UniFi controller via API, provided by Ubiquiti. Zabbix's Low-level Discovery (LLD) protocol are supported.

UniFi Proxy act as TCP server and offer more perfomance for big UniFi installations than CLI-based UniFi Miner, which stay best for debug purposes.

Both of scripts are supported:

  • UniFi Controllers:
    • version 2;
    • version 3;
    • version 4;
    • version 5.
  • Controller's objects:
    • Sites;
    • WLANs;
    • Users & Usergroups;
    • Health & Sysinfo;
    • Networks;
    • Vouchers;
    • DPI data.
  • UniFi devices registered on the Сontroller:
    • Access Points (UAP);
    • Switches (USW);
    • Phones (UPH);
    • Extensions & numbers (VOIP);
    • Security Gateways (USG).
  • Group operation for metrics: discovery, count, sum, percent of count, percent of sum, arithmetic and median average calculation, minimum and maximum value search;
  • Filtering metrics with various conditions and logical operation.

UniFi Proxy can interact with Zabbix via loadable module.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
author: sadman
